name: AVAudioMixing
desc: A collection of properties that are applicable to the input bus of a mixer node.

items.name: protocol AVAudioStereoMixing
items.desc: A protocol that defines stereo mixing properties a mixer uses.

items.name: protocol AVAudio3DMixing
items.desc: A collection of properties that define 3D mixing properties.

items.name: class AVAudioMixingDestination
items.desc: An object that represents a connection to a mixer node from a node that conforms to the audio mixing protocol.

items.name: func destination(forMixer: AVAudioNode, bus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioMixingDestination?
items.desc: Gets the audio mixing destination object that corresponds to the specified mixer node and input bus.
